title: Coordinate a Track Inspection
description: A section of track is due for its mandated quarterly inspection. A manager must schedule the inspection.

tasks.description: Receive a system alert that a track segment is due for inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager is aware of the upcoming compliance task.

tasks.description: Schedule a track inspection crew for the task.
Arrange for a track maintenance window with the network dispatchers so the inspectors can work safely.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work window is granted by dispatch.

tasks.description: The crew performs the inspection and logs their findings in the system, marking the task as complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspection is completed and documented, ensuring regulatory compliance.
